short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace an old and boring new tab with a beautiful, modern and fully feature personalized tab. You ll have great joy using it. :)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Start your day on your desktop with a beautiful wallpaper and inspired quote. If you are lazy like me you ll like the sidebar where we added most visited site on the web and to make your life little easier we have added a todo app so that you can do more. And not only this we have also added an expense tracker app so that you have record of your every penny. Wait you have much more we also added a beautiful bookmark module so that so don't forget sites you needed the most.

So what are you waiting for... Try Koro your personalized new tab manager which is beautifully crafted for beautiful people like you. Try KORO NOW !!!
